CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 16, 1957, pg. 3, reads: "Bathroom Ceiling - This is the ceiling of the "better" bathroom on the first floor and the floor of the bathroom on the second floor (shown in picture directly above this) [2001.35.45936]. You can see through hole into lower bathroom.  Leak from toilet on floor above falls constantly into bathtub on first floor.  Note lack of wallpaper and paint, which is the case in many places in the double houses."
TitMainTitle: Dilapidated bathroom ceiling with exposed plumbing and wall studs, in 1015 Western Avenue, North Side
